title: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania + 8 DLCs + Controller Fix
body:
Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania + 8 DLCs + Controller Fix


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio, SEGA
Languages: ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 2.5 GB
Repack Size: 1.2 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Super.Monkey.Ball.Banana.Mania-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-supermonkeyballbananamania.iso (2,656,182,272 bytes)
  • Missing DLC files (14 MB) added; 8 DLCs are included and activated
  • Alternative preconfigured Goldberg/SSE emulator is available in NoDVD folder in case you have problems with a controller (use SmartSteamLoader_x64.exe ro run the game). Thanks to Christsnatcher!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.5 to 1.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-5 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 3.2 GB (7.3 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in “smbbm_Data\Plugins\x86_64\steam_api.ini” file
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Roll through wondrous worlds with AiAi and friends as you race to stop monkey mad scientist Dr. Bad-Boon from blowing up Jungle Island! Join the all-star monkey team of AiAi, MeeMee, GonGon, Baby, YanYan and Doctor as you bounce, tilt, and roll your way across hundreds of delightfully crafted levels and mazes. It’s monkey business for the gang as you take down Dr. Bad-Boon and steal back your beloved bananas!

Game Features

  • The ultimate Super Monkey Ball Experience – More than 300 stages from Super Monkey Ball, Super Monkey Ball 2 and Super Monkey Ball Deluxe.
  • Go Bananas with 12 fun minigames including Monkey Racing, Monkey Soccer, Monkey Bowling, Monkey Baseball and much more!
  • Challenge your friends as you compete for the top banana on the online leaderboards!
  • Immerse yourself in the Super Monkey Ball world with creative comic-book-style storytelling in Story Mode.
  • Want to be the coolest monkey on the block? Customize your character and Super Monkey Ball to make it your own!

Included DLCs:

  • Hello Kitty
  • Classic Soundtrack
  • Customization Pack
  • Classic Character Pack
  • SEGA Legends Pack
  • Golden Banana
  • Bonus Cosmetic Pack
  • Headwear Pack
